$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|A beorc festival, is it? Then it has
nothing to do with the dragon tribe?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロイナ,ch09_21_Ina_F_Halloween20,Face|It seems that way...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロデギンハンザー,ch11_19_Dheginsea_M_Halloween20,Face|Though, that girl, Tiki... The festival
brings a smile to her face, so it must
go on.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ハロイナ,ch09_21_Ina_F_Halloween20,Face|This way, please. We must regroup
with the others.$k$p$Sbs150|
